html:
OnePlus is apparently working on an entirely new line of products, which will be very gamer-oriented. The smartphones in this line will have bigger batteries than the other OnePlus devices, flagship chipsets, and dedicated gaming triggers.

The bad news is that initially this new series will only be available in China. But of course, if it proves to be a huge success over there, it may then make it to international markets.

OnePlus 13

Unfortunately, no other details about this line or any member device have been outed so far, but we'll let you know when we find out more.

In the meantime, let us know in the comments whether you're excited to see something more gamer-oriented from OnePlus. This sounds like it would compete head-on with RedMagic, for example.
